title: A Little help please
body: so i had 2 perma skins, project ash 2 key frags and 2 boxes all in my looting crafting system thing, and now they have all vanished, is there a known way to fix this ?

replies.body:
Hey there,

Normally things like this are just display issues and a client restart should resolve them, however if this doesn't help then you'll have to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) to Player Support for further assistance.

We here on the boards are unable to assist with account specific inquiries.
